messages.content: Only a Green vote will prevent another chaotic, damaging Brexit, and tackle the climate emergency. Greens have always worked for fairer, cleaner, more thoughtful politics...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Greens take action needed to transform Britain. We make the decisions needed to transform Britain, to work for everyone again.
Brexit is a disaster. Only Greens have always worked to keep Britain part of Europe, we could campaign to remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
Greens take the lead in tackling climate chaos, investing in public transport, warm homes and hundreds of thousands of new green jobs.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit is a disaster. Greens have always worked to keep Britain part of Europe.
issues.environment: Greens take the lead in tackling climate chaos, investing in public transport, warm homes and hundreds of thousands of new green jobs.
issues.labourEmployment: Hundreds of thousands of new green jobs.
issues.transport: Greens take the lead in tackling climate chaos, investing in public transport.

community.content: Ollie Sykes has helped hundreds of residents with issues such as housing, social care, education, and refuse and recycling.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ollie Sykes has been standing up for Hove. Ollie has helped hundreds of residents with issues such as housing, social care, education, and refuse and recycling. He successfully lobbied for an extra £500,000 in 2019 to tackle climate emergency head on, and led the Green councillors’ work on Brexit, so that Brighton & Hove City council was the first in England to call for a People’s Vote.

politicalExperience.role: Councillor for Brunswick & Adelaide ward and Green finance spokesperson
politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully lobbied for an extra £500,000 in 2019 to tackle climate emergency head on. Led the Green councillors' work on Brexit.

contactInformation.address: Brighton & Hove Green Party, 39-41 Surrey Street, Brighton BN1 3PB

endorsements.endorsement: We need more people in Parliament like Caroline Lucas, who has represented Brighton Pavilion for nine years. In both the EU and local elections in May, Greens topped the poll in Brighton & Hove. Politics is wide open now. Electing a Green MP in Hove is possible. Vote for who you believe in. Greens can win.

images.caption: Wake up, rise up. Our planet is dying.

examples: He successfully lobbied for an extra £500,000 in 2019 to tackle climate emergency head on.
European Parliament election results, Brighton & Hove, May 2019.
Politics is wide open now. Electing a Green MP in Hove is possible.
We need more people in Parliament like Caroline Lucas.

He successfully lobbied for an extra £500,000 in 2019 to tackle climate emergency head on.
Greens take the lead in tackling climate chaos.
Vote Green to say: Yes to Europe, No to Climate Chaos, A Fairer Britain.
